name: io.github.lu-zhengda/mcp-python-exec-sandbox
description: Sandboxed Python execution for AI agents. Run scripts in ephemeral, isolated environments with PEP 723 inline dependencies, multi-version Python, and zero host pollution.

arguments.name: --sandbox-backend
arguments.description: Sandbox backend: native (bwrap, Linux only), docker, or none. Defaults to native on Linux, docker on macOS.
